Class GLWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.tak.platform.widgets.opengl.GLWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public abstract class GLWidget
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGLWidget, IMapWidget.OnWidgetSizeChangedListener, IMapWidget.OnWidgetPointChangedListener, IMapWidget.OnVisibleChangedListener
    Map widget with view properties such as width, height, margin, and padding
